name: Sour Mama - Exbeeriment #1
style: Sour Ale w/ Blueberries and Grapes
description: Berlinerweiss style sour ale with local blueberries and grapes.  Fermented with our sourdough mother culture in a port wine barrel this beer is effervescent and full of fruit with a touch of funk.  Its tartness is middle of the road.
